tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Cloud Data Lakehouse

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1a: Create Groups, Users, Policies and Autonomous Warehouse Database (ADW)
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through user setup and configuration and puts the foundation in place to prepare data cataloging, loading and maintaining for the data lakes.

tutorials.title: Lab 1b: Load Initial Data
tutorials.description: The database has been created with the users and policies but before we look at the catalog and integrations, the initial set of data should be loaded and available.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: OCI Data Integration, OCI Data Catalog and Data Assets
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to add various data assets and add business terms to define your data

tutorials.title: Lab 3: OCI Data Flow in the Data Lake
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to an Application to load new data assets using Oracle Data Flow

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Lakehouse: Put it together for Analytics
tutorials.description: This lab shows you pull data into analytics, and reviews the Oracle Data Lake House.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
